09_01.question: A sample access control requirement would be what?

A_09_01.choice: Customer service reps can modify customer files but not delete them

B_09_01.choice: Data will be encrypted for secure ordering

C_09_01.choice: All uploaded files will be checked for viruses

D_09_01.choice: The system will cost $38,900 per minute of downtime in lost revenues

A_09_02.choice: Partitioning a physical server into smaller virtual servers

C_09_02.choice: Using a laptop as a server

B_09_03.choice: Almost all or most of the application logic

C_09_03.choice: Almost none or less than half of the application logic

D_09_03.choice: Almost all of the data logic

09_06.question: Expected business changes to which the system should be able to adapt.

09_18.question: An example of an asymmetric encryption algorithm is public key encryption.

09_19.question: Designing an architecture can be what?

A_09_19.choice: Tedious and therefore younger members of the team are usually urged to take the lead.

B_09_19.choice: Easy and therefore more experienced members of the department take the lead.

C_09_19.choice: Easy and therefore outside consultants are often sourced to do the task.

D_09_19.choice: Easy and therefore experienced internal members are sourced to the task.

E_09_19.choice: Difficult and therefore, many organizations use the skills of experienced, expert system architects (consultants or employees) who specialize in the task.

B_09_32.choice: Client device is responsible for business logic

C_09_32.choice: The server is responsible for data access logic

A_09_33.choice: They put great load on the network

B_09_33.choice: It is more difficult to program and test software

E_09_33.choice: They are the very first architecture system

09_34.question: The objective of architecture design is to determine what?

A_09_34.choice: How aesthetically pleasing the server system will be

B_09_34.choice: What parts of the application software will be assigned to what hardware

C_09_34.choice: How the computers will be arranged to provide ample storage

D_09_34.choice: Where the mainframe will be situated

09_35.question: An example of a multilingual requirement is what?

A_09_35.choice: The system will operate in English, French and Spanish

B_09_35.choice: Country managers can define custom fields

C_09_35.choice: All date fields will be presented in a uniform format

D_09_35.choice: Personal information about English customers cannot be sent to Chinese systems

E_09_35.choice: Country managers are able to change telephone number formats
